title: 651 - Father's Day
description: Rose takes on the past, Marty McFly style. The podcast will provide a safe place of cozy cover as birds fly in the sky.   Tonight’s episode is sponsored by Soothe!  Soothe is the on-demand massage service that lets you experience a relaxing massage in the comfort of your own home, hotel or office.   Book right on your phone or on the web and Soothe connects you with one of their hand-selected, highly skilled massage therapists in as little as an hour. Try it this week and get $25 OFF your first massage using the code“sleepwithme” https://www.soothe.com/
